trends: There have been 51 other sightings in Auckland
There were no other sightings in Auckland on or around July 15th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy partner ran inside telling me to look at what was going on. Went outside and saw a red glowing object falling towards the ground. We discussed it and thought it might be a large lantern. Then about 4 minutes later I saw another (parachute with a red glow in the middle) above us falling and getting smaller and further away, and then another few minutes went past and we saw another and then another. We could not see any landing, as after a while they just disappeared. Sat outside for another 10 minutes and didn't see anything else.
Summary: parachute with red glow x4 in 15 minutes falling towards NE
